preventionReactions.title: I DON’T WANT TO DISAPPOINT
preventionReactions.description: I’m avoiding people because I don’t want to disappoint them

preventionReactions.title: I’M AVOIDING
preventionReactions.description: I’m missing opportunities because of avoiding what’s not good for me

preventionReactions.title: I'M WARDING OFF
preventionReactions.description: I’m caught up in warding off some negative future

preventionReactions.title: I’M DEFENSIVE
preventionReactions.description: I’m too quick to say “No”, focussing too much on what could go wrong

preventionReactions.title: I’M DELAYING
preventionReactions.description: I'm slowing things down unnecessarily just so they feel less threatening to me

preventionReactions.title: I’M FEELING DEPRESSED
preventionReactions.description: I’m feeling depressed about being unable to prevent wrongs from happening again

preventionReactions.title: I’M MISSING OPPORTUNITIES
preventionReactions.description: I’m too busy preventing wrong to notice what is going right, missing opportunities

preventionReactions.title: I’M LOSING PROGRESS
preventionReactions.description: I’m losing progress, playing it too safe for fear of losing control

preventionReactions.title: I WANT CONTROL
preventionReactions.description: I’m preoccupied with bringing things under control so they can’t get any worse

preventionReactions.title: I’M TENSE
preventionReactions.description: I’m very concerned and tense about preventing future negatives

preventionReactions.title: I’M TOO ON GUARD
preventionReactions.description: I’m constantly on guard and 'preventional' about what might come up

preventionReactions.title: I’M TRYING TO PREVENT
preventionReactions.description: I’m inappropriately trying to prevent the wrong thing from happening

preventionReactions.title: I NEED TO CONTROL
preventionReactions.description: I’m trying to bring things under control so they don’t feel threatening

preventionReactions.title: I'M TOO PREVENTION FOCUSED
preventionReactions.description: I’m focusing on what could go wrong and how to prevent that if possible

preventionReactions.title: I NEED TO STAY ON TRACK
preventionReactions.description: I’m trying not to let things get off track
